verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
C
Praise the name of Jesus
Praise the name of Jesus
He's my Rock He's my Fortress
He's my Deliverer
In Him will I trust
Praise the name of Jesus

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
We Praise Your name Lord Jesus
We Praise Your name Lord Jesus
You're our Rock
You're our Fortress
You're our Deliverer
In You will we trust
We
Praise Your name Lord Jesus
